home.description: I'm a 24-year-old full-stack web developer living in Raleigh, NC. I have a passion for creating engaging interfaces, as well as building the "behind-the-scenes" architecture. Take a look through my blog or read through my portfolio to learn more. Feel free to reach out to me for more information, as well!
